title: How to fix RADS Error
body:
This is what worked for me I accessed my adapter and changed the DNS to 8.8.8.8 and this fioxed it for me.
Control Panel > Network and Sharing Centre > Change Adapted Settings > Properties
Select IPv4 and click Properties
Set Preferred DNS to 8.8.8.8
Good luck everyone.

replies.body: I just ran every version of the lolclient.exe from the Riot Games folder. Most of them crashed but one of them worked.
